ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] I never thought I'd see the day!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats!  Yeah the LDoN adventures are cool they give out decent exp, my dark elf shadknight went from barely 29 to halfway to 30 fighting blue mobs in BB.  That
ygData.messageBody:
Grats!  Yeah the LDoN adventures are cool they give out decent exp, my dark elf shadknight went from barely 29 to halfway to 30 fighting blue mobs in BB.  That was my first adventure as well and I think they are a great idea, no trains, spamming, or KSing to worry about. 
-----Original Message-----
From: Ron Gillespie [mailto:rgillispie@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 11, 2003 11:45 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com; EQ-Trimaris@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] I never thought I'd see the day!!!

 
But my druid has finally dinged level 50!!!    WOOT!!!! *MAD CELEBRATION*
 
Man, it's been a long time coming!   If I feel this ecstatic about level 50 think how I'm gonna be at 65!  by the time I hti that they'll have raised the level cap to 70!
 
I just recently purchased LDON but my cable modem got disconnected so I could not play for like 2 months.  I moved to a new place and got cable modem reconnected and finally had my first adventure tonight!!  I did the Collect 28 Mummy Wrappings in Mistmore, and also the Kill 60 in Mistmore.  Successful on both and dinged 50 to boot!! 
 
Time to start working on my epic I guess!
 
Raido Covenfall
50 ELF DRU
Cazic Thule Server
 
 
aka Wulfric Rennison


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
